column5: This charming 3bd 2bth home close to San Antonio, Schlitterbahn, Fiesta Texas, Randolph AFB, Ft. Sam, New Braunfels, highways, dining, nightlife and shopping. Enjoy a full kitchen, all appliances(including full sized washer and dryer), wifi, cable, 5+ car driveway, covered patio and large yard and a new park & library 2blks away!!! 25mins from Downtown San Antonio 30mins from Fiesta Texas/La Cantera 27mins from Schlitterbahn 10mins from the Forum Shopping Center 21mins from FT. Sam
